content: the aerwyna blouse this pattern can be viewed for free on my blog here 1 *note on the yarn* bernat cotton-ish is listed as a dk yarn but at 15 wpi it is close to a sport weight as such many sport weight yarns would work with this pattern some of my testers used premier yarns cotton fair and patons lace always be sure to swatch before starting your top finished sizes instructions given to fit size x-small changes for small medium large x-large 2x-large 3x-large 4x-large and 5x-large are in xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl 4xl 5xl finished bust 33 34 37 40 44 48 52 56 60 finished length customizable length on model shown is 25 materials i used bernat cotton-ish which is 55% cotton/45% acrylic it is listed as a #3 dk weight yarn but it is actually a little thin for dk so a #2 sport weight would work as well approximately 700 850 1000 1200 1300 1400 1500 1550 1600 yds to make the length shown h/5mm hook stitch markers yarn needle scissors this pattern has been tested by a number of experienced crocheters and i have provided many pictures within the pattern to help you along the way if you run into trouble you are free to message me for help 1 https //ineeditcrochet com/aerwyna-blouse-free-crochet-pattern/
